price: Kandi ubwami bw’ibirere n’ubw’isi ni ubwa Allah, ndetse kwa Allah ni ho (byose) bizasubira.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi al-maṣīru
